claim.mechanism: contains curcumin which inhibits inflammatory cytokines

topics.name: Turmeric Reduces Skin Redness
topics.description: Turmeric's active compound curcumin has been shown to reduce inflammatory markers associated with skin redness and hyperpigmentation.

claim.mechanism: provides monounsaturated fatty acids that support skin barrier function

topics.name: Avocado Improves Dry Skin
topics.description: Avocado consumption provides healthy fats and vitamin E that support skin hydration from within.

claim.mechanism: contains hormones and growth factors that stimulate sebum production

topics.name: Dairy Worsens Acne
topics.description: Dairy consumption has been associated with increased acne severity due to its hormone content affecting sebaceous gland activity.

claim.mechanism: increases IGF-1 levels promoting sebocyte proliferation

topics.name: Dairy Increases Acne Through IGF-1
topics.description: Dairy consumption raises insulin-like growth factor 1, which promotes sebocyte proliferation and acne lesions.

claim.mechanism: various compounds reduce inflammation and improve circulation

topics.name: Herbs and Spices Improve Skin Health
topics.description: Several herbs and spices contain anti-inflammatory compounds that can benefit oily skin when consumed regularly.

claim.mechanism: multiple nutrients support skin barrier and hydration

topics.name: Foods That Hydrate Dry Skin
topics.description: Certain foods provide essential fatty acids and vitamins that help combat dry skin from the inside out.

claim.mechanism: exhibits antibacterial properties against P. acnes bacteria

topics.name: Neem Reduces Acne Breakouts
topics.description: Neem leaf extract applied topically demonstrates antibacterial activity that helps reduce acne-causing bacteria.

claim.mechanism: provides vitamin K and antioxidants that reduce vascular inflammation

topics.name: Kale Calms Skin Redness
topics.description: Kale's high vitamin K and antioxidant content supports healthy capillaries and reduces inflammatory redness.
